summary: The bill, titled the Creating Additional Seats to Ease Legally Overburdened Adjudicators’ Dockets Act of 2025, or the CASE LOAD Act of 2025, aims to address the high caseload and limited number of judges in the Eastern District of California. It mandates the President to appoint additional district judges in 2027, 2029, and 2031. The appointments will take place for the years 2027, 2029, and 2031, with corresponding updates to the judicial district tables. The bill also authorizes the appropriation of funds to support the additions.
